entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
